Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.player

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.player.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MatchListener, Damageable, java.util.EventListener
    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements Damageable, MatchListener
    This class represents the player entity, storing all info about its status during the match

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private CompoundAction activeAction
      This property stores the action that the player is currently doing, null if it is not doing anything

      This property stores the weapon the player is currently using

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player​(Match match,
              PlayerInfo info,
              PlayerConstraints constraints)
        This constructor creates a player from the basic info: the player will be empty and ready to start a new match
        Parameters:
        match - the match this new player belongs to
        info - a PlayerInfo object containing the basic info
        constraints - a PlayerConstraints object containing a set of rules regarding the health and the scoring

    • Method Detail

      • getDamageTokens

        public java.util.List<DamageToken> getDamageTokens()
        This method returns the damage tokens received so far by this Damageable
        Specified by:
        getDamageTokens in interface Damageable
        Returns:
        a list containing the DamageToken received so far, the list will be empty if there are none

      • addDamageTokens

        public void addDamageTokens​(java.util.List<DamageToken> newTokens)
        This method assigns damage tokens to a Player. It checks how much damage can still be added and notifies the listeners in case of death or overkill
        Specified by:
        addDamageTokens in interface Damageable
        Parameters:
        newTokens - a list of DamageToken that should be given to the Player

        Parameters:

      • grabWeapon

        public void grabWeapon​(WeaponTile weapon,
                       java.util.List<AmmoCube> ammoCubes,
                       java.util.List<PowerupTile> powerups,
                       WeaponTile discardedWeapon)
        This method allows the player to buy a new weapon when he already has the maximum allowed, exchanging it for one of those he owns
        Parameters:
        weapon - the WeaponTile that the player is buying
        ammoCubes - the cost the player is paying with ammoCubes
        powerups - the cost the player is paying with powerups
        discardedWeapon - the WeaponTile the player is giving up for the new one

      • grabWeapon

        public void grabWeapon​(WeaponTile weapon,
                       java.util.List<Coin> coins,
                       WeaponTile discardedWeapon)
        This method allows the player to buy a new weapon when he already has the maximum allowed, exchanging it for one of those he owns
        Parameters:
        weapon - the WeaponTile that the player is buying
        coins - the list of Coins the player is using to pay
        discardedWeapon - the WeaponTile the player is giving up for the new one

      • getAvailableMacroActions

        public ActionTile getAvailableMacroActions()
        This method determines the status of a player at a given time, based on: - player's health - current match mode - final frenzy turns Then the ActionTileFactory is called to return the correspondent set of macro actions
        Returns:
        the action tile representing the available macro actions the player can do

      • isAlive

        public boolean isAlive()
        This method gets the life status of the player
        Returns:
        true if player is currently alive, false if he is dead

      • sees

        public boolean sees​(Player otherPlayer)
        This method returns true if the player sees the other player given as parameter. It means the two players are in the same room or this player is next to the door that leads to the room of the other player
        Parameters:
        otherPlayer - is the player to see if is on line of sight
        Returns:
        true if this player sees otherPlayer

      • isFullOfAmmoAndPowerups

        public boolean isFullOfAmmoAndPowerups()
        This method returns true if the player cannot pick any more ammo or powerups because he has reached the limit set by constraints
        Returns:
        true if the player cannot pick any more ammo or powerups
